_metadata.description: Tier 4 Audit Data Summary - Historical audit and performance data for analytics

overview.description: Audit and performance data including labeled cases, satisfaction scores, and constituency reports

guntur_audit.description: 2,298 audited Guntur cases with lapse labels and department breakdown

key_metrics.top_lapse: GRA did not speak to citizen (42.19%)

structure.lapse_categories: 13 lapse types with counts and percentages

constituency_preaudit.description: 243,133 pre-audit cases across 26 districts and constituencies

key_metrics.common_pattern: GRA did not speak to citizen is top lapse in ALL districts

structure.lapse_breakdown: Top lapses by district and constituency

use_cases: Held-out test set for ML models (different districts from Guntur)
constituency_preaudit.extraction_status: PARTIAL - Extracted in audit_reports.json, needs full constituency-level detail

call_center_feedback.description: 93,892 call center (1100) feedback records with department satisfaction scores

structure.computed_metrics: dept_risk_score, rank, relative_weight for each department

constituency_preaudit.json.action: Parse CONSTITUENCY PRE AUDIT REPORT markdown → structured JSON
constituency_preaudit.json.complexity: HIGH - complex table structure in markdown

performance_dashboard: Load call_center_feedback.json for satisfaction by department
Load guntur_audit.json for improper rates by department
Cross-reference to identify departments with low satisfaction AND high improper rates
Generate risk matrix: Revenue (low satisfaction, high improper) vs Agriculture (high satisfaction, low improper)
geographic_analysis: Load constituency_preaudit.json for district-wise improper rates
Identify districts with >40% improper rates (need intervention)
Identify best-performing districts (5-10% improper) for best practice sharing
Trend analysis: Has Guntur improved since Nov 2025 audit?
officer_evaluation: Cross-reference with lapse_categories to identify behavioral vs procedural issues
Generate officer scorecards: improper %, top lapses, recommended training
Track repeat offenders across multiple months
quality_prediction: Use guntur_audit.json as training data (2,298 labeled cases)
Deploy model to predict likely lapses before citizen feedback

implementation_priority.notes: Guntur and call center data are already extracted; constituency report needs parsing

interim_solution.constituency_data: Reference markdown file until full extraction complete

notes: Tier 4 data is for analytics and insights, not real-time processing
Guntur audit data is single-district; may not generalize to all 26 districts
Constituency pre-audit provides state-wide coverage but less detail per case
Call center satisfaction is citizen-reported; may differ from audit findings
Combining audit + satisfaction data provides comprehensive quality picture
Ideal ML pipeline: Train on Guntur, validate on other districts, test on held-out constituencies
